doc.after: Another interpretation, that avoids duality, is the De BroglieâBohm theory: knowned also as the pilot-wave model, the photon in this theory is both, wave and particle.[62] "This idea seems to me so natural and simple, to resolve the wave-particle dilemma in such a clear and ordinary way, that it is a great mystery to me that it was so generally ignored",[63] J.S.Bell.
